AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Over the past 3 years as a Full-Stack Developer, I am working end‑to‑end on enterprise applications, developing backend APIs and services with Express.js and MongoDB to building backend systems. My toolkit includes frontend frameworks such as Angular , and backend stacks like Node.js, Express.js, and Go
My approach emphasizes scalable, maintainable systems. I optimize performance, enforce reusable patterns, and prioritize clean code.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I am/was part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lenovo XClarity One
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Lenovo XClarity One is a unified and flexible management platform that streamlines the administration of Lenovo servers. Deployable either as a hybrid cloud-based solution or as an on-premises virtual machine, it provides a consistent and intuitive interface for monitoring, managing, and optimizing data center infrastructure.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lenovo XClarity One Hub
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Hubs are light-weight device managers that act as a secure bridge between the Lenovo XClarity One portal and your on-premises devices. The hubs are the only devices that communicate directly with the XClarity One.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Lenovo XClarity Orchestrator
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Lenovo XClarity Orchestrator provides centralized monitoring, management, provisioning, and analytics for environments with large numbers of devices. It leverages existing resource managers (such as Lenovo XClarity Administrator and Schneider Electric EcoStruxure IT Expert) across multiple sites to view overall health, collect device inventory and health summaries, drill down into device details, view event and audit logs, and apply updates to managed resources.
